scripts.build: npm run clean -s && run-p build-scripts build-styles && echo ✔ done production build
scripts.build-debug: npm run clean -s && run-p build-scripts-debug build-styles && echo ✔ done debug build
scripts.build-scripts: browserify source/main.ts -p [ tsify ] -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify > dist/main.bundle.uncompressed.js && uglifyjs -cm < dist/main.bundle.uncompressed.js > dist/main.bundle.js
